race.name: Castellon Gravel Race
race.tagline: Spanish mountains—120km of Llucena gravel, 2,200m elevation, May warmth, affordable entry.

terrain.surface: 80% gravel, 20% paved roads. Spanish mountains—rolling terrain, technical sections. 2,200 m over 120 km. Llucena area. Technical rating: 3/5.

biased_opinion.summary: Castellon Gravel Race is Spanish mountains—120 km, 2,200 m elevation. Founded ~2019. 80% gravel, 20% paved. Spanish mountains—rolling terrain, technical sections. 400-600 riders. Llucena, Castellon (mountain town). May spring conditions (15-28°C). Affordable entry (€80-€120 / $85-$130). If you want Spanish mountains gravel with stunning scenery and affordable entry, this is it. If you need local/domestic, skip it. International destination race.
biased_opinion.bottom_line: Castellon Gravel Race is Spanish mountains gravel. 120 km, 2,200 m, May warmth. If you want Spanish mountains scenery with affordable entry, this is it. If you need local/domestic, skip it. International travel required but Valencia access is easy. Post-race Spanish food/wine.

black_pill.title: INTERNATIONAL TRAVEL + 120KM + MAY HEAT
black_pill.reality: International travel to Spain required. Valencia airport 80 km (1-hour drive). 120 km is long. 2,200 m cumulative elevation. May = 18-28°C (warm). 10-15% DNF. You'll pay €80-€120 ($85-$130) + international travel. If you need local/domestic, this isn't it. If you want Spanish mountains gravel with affordable entry, this is it. Travel adds cost but Spain makes it worth it.
black_pill.expectation_reset: Castellon Gravel Race is international destination race. Spain travel required. 120 km, 2,200 m cumulative, May warmth. If you need local/domestic, skip it. If you want Spanish mountains gravel with affordable entry, this is it. Travel adds cost but Spain experience is worth it.

logistics.travel_summary: Fly to Valencia (VLC). Rental car needed (80 km, 1-hour drive to Llucena). Mountain town lodging—book early. Day-before packet pickup. Race May. Post-race Spanish food/wine.
logistics.food_options: Aid stations on course. Post-race party with Spanish food/wine.

course_description.character: 120 km, 2,200 m. 80% gravel, 20% paved. Spanish mountains—rolling terrain. Technical rating: 3/5.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: Spanish Mountains Rolling Terrain
suffering_zones.description: Rolling Spanish mountains. 2,200 m cumulative elevation.
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: Pace conservatively. Moderate gears. Cumulative elevation adds up. 120 km long.

suffering_zones.name: Throughout: May Warmth
suffering_zones.survival_strategy: 3+ bottles. Sun protection. Hydrate. Start early. Warmth is manageable.

course_description.signature_challenge: 120 km + 2,200 m cumulative elevation. Spanish mountains May warmth.

history.origin_story: Castellon Gravel Race founded ~2019. Llucena, Castellon, Spain. 120 km, 400-600 riders. Spanish mountains gravel.
history.reputation: Spanish gravel scene. Llucena. Well-organized. Affordable entry. International destination.
